LanguageData.MedicalTendQualityOffset.label: healer tend quality offset
LanguageData.MedicalTendQualityOffset.description: Healer tend quality is offset by this value.
LanguageData.SurgerySuccessChanceFactor.description: A multiplier to the chance that a surgery will succeed when performed here.\n\nSurgery success chances are also affected by many other factors, including the healer's ability and medicine used.
